revisionDesc.change: Vote - AcceptText - Accept. Needs to have app entries to signal departures from SB 26.16795. Lin1--> (ἀπερχομ(ένῳ)) εἰς .1[ca.8].2 τ̣ῶ̣ν ἀποδοσίμων|ed: N. Gonis, ZPE 171 (2009) 209|ἀπερχομ[ένῳ] [ca.25-30]; lin2--> νομισματίου τρίτον παρὰ κεράτιον ἓν ἥμισυ,|ed: N. Gonis, ZPE 171 (2009) 209|νομ[ισματίου τρίτον παρὰ κεράτιον ἓν ἥμισυ,] ; lin3 (μ(όνον))· --> (μ(όνον)). ; lin3 (νο̣(μισματίου)) --> (νο(μισματίου)); lin3 --> ἥμισυ (ἰδ(ιωτικῷ)).|ed: N. Gonis, ZPE 171 (2009) 209|[ἥμισυ (μ(όνον))] [.?]; NOTE: diaeresis throughout appears on plate but is printed in none of the editions here (ZPE 132 (2000) 181; SB 26.16795; ZPE 171 (2009) 209)
Add dummy header for original identifier 'papyri.info/ddbdp/p.herm;;80' pointing to new identifier 'papyri.info/ddbdp/sb;26;16795'
Emended P.Herm. 80 after SB XXVI 16795, but the version entered is that of the completed text, published in ZPE 171 (2009) 209f.
changed schema; added xml:space=preserve; indented; moved title/@n to idno
Added language la-Grek; tagged num rend=fraction
Converted from TEI P4 (EpiDoc DTD v. 6) to P5 (EpiDoc RNG schema)
